# .NET Framework tools

- [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md): Use AI.exe, the Assembly Linker tool. This tool generates a file that has an assembly manifest from one or more files that are either modules or resource files.
- [Aximp.exe (Windows Forms ActiveX Control Importer)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/tools/aximp-exe-windows-forms-activex-control-importer.md): Understand Aximp.exe, the Windows Forms ActiveX Control Importer. This tool converts type definitions in a COM type library for ActiveX into Windows Forms.
- [Caspol.exe (Code Access Security Policy Tool)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/tools/caspol-exe-code-access-security-policy-tool.md): Review the Caspol.exe, the Code Access Security (CAS) Policy tool. This tool lets users and administrators modify security policy for different policy levels.
- [Cert2spc.exe (Software Publisher Certificate Test Tool)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/tools/cert2spc-exe-software-publisher-certificate-test-tool.md): Use Cert2spc.exe, the Software Publisher Certificate Test tool. This tool creates a Software Publisher's Certificate (SPC) from one or more X.509 certificates.
- [Certmgr.exe (Certificate Manager Tool)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/tools/certmgr-exe-certificate-manager-tool.md): Explore Certmgr.exe, the Certificate Manager tool. This tool manages certificates, certificate trust lists (CTLs), and certificate revocation lists (CRLs).
- [Clrver.exe (CLR Version Tool)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/tools/clrver-exe-clr-version-tool.md): Review Clrver.exe, the CLR Version tool. This tool reports all installed versions of the common language runtime (CLR) on the computer.
- [CorFlags.exe (CorFlags Conversion Tool)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/tools/corflags-exe-corflags-conversion-tool.md): Understand CorFlags.exe, the CorFlags Conversion tool. This tool lets you configure the CorFlags section of the header of a portable executable image.
- [Fuslogvw.exe (Assembly Binding Log Viewer)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/tools/fuslogvw-exe-assembly-binding-log-viewer.md): Use Fuslogvw.exe, the Assembly Binding Log Viewer. This viewer shows assembly bind details, which helps diagnose why .NET can't find an assembly at runtime.
- [Gacutil.exe (Global Assembly Cache Tool)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/tools/gacutil-exe-gac-tool.md): Get details about Gacutil.exe, the Global Assembly Cache tool. This tool lets you view and manipulate the global assembly cache and download cache.
- [Ilasm.exe (IL Assembler)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md): Get started with Ilasm.exe, the IL Assembler. This tool generates a portable executable (PE) file from intermediate language (IL) assembly.
- [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md): Use Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler), which takes a portable executable (PE) file containing intermediate language (IL) code, and makes a text file for Ilasm.exe.
- [.NET Framework tools](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/tools/index.md): See a list of .NET tools that make it easier for you to create, deploy, and manage applications and components that target .NET.
- [Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md): Use Installutil.exe, the Installer Tool. This tool lets you install or uninstall server resources by executing the installer components in specified assemblies.
- [Lc.exe (License Compiler)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/tools/lc-exe-license-compiler.md): Use Lc.exe, the License Compiler. This tool reads text files that have licensing information and makes a binary file to embed in a CLR executable as a resource.
- [Mage.exe (Manifest Generation and Editing Tool)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/tools/mage-exe-manifest-generation-and-editing-tool.md): Get started with Mage.exe, the Manifest Generation and Editing Tool. This tool supports the creation and editing of application and deployment manifests.
- [MageUI.exe (Manifest Generation and Editing Tool, Graphical Client)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/tools/mageui-exe-manifest-generation-and-editing-tool-graphical-client.md): Explore MageUI.exe, the Manifest Generation and Editing Tool, Graphical Client. Create, edit, and sign deployment and application manifests with this GUI tool.
- [MDbg.exe (.NET Framework Command-Line Debugger)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/tools/mdbg-exe.md): Understand MDbg.exe, the command-line debugger for .NET, which helps tools vendors and application developers find and fix bugs in programs targeting the CLR.
- [Mgmtclassgen.exe (Management Strongly Typed Class Generator)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/tools/mgmtclassgen-exe.md): Understand Mgmtclassgen.exe, the Management Strongly Typed Class Generator. This tool lets you quickly generate an early-bound managed class for a WMI class.
- [Mpgo.exe (Managed Profile Guided Optimization Tool)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/tools/mpgo-exe-managed-profile-guided-optimization-tool.md): Use Mpgo.exe, the Managed Profile Guided Optimization Tool. With this tool, optimize native image assemblies created by the Native Image Generator (Ngen.exe).
- [Ngen.exe (Native Image Generator)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/tools/ngen-exe-native-image-generator.md): Review Ngen.exe, the Native Image Generator. Improve managed application performance by creating native images and installing into the local native image cache.
- [Peverify.exe (PEVerify Tool)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/tools/peverify-exe-peverify-tool.md): Use Peverify.exe (portable executable verify) to help determine if MSIL code & metadata meet type safety standards in .NET.
- [Regasm.exe (Assembly Registration Tool)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/tools/regasm-exe-assembly-registration-tool.md): Use Regasm.exe, the Assembly Registration tool. Read assembly metadata and add the needed entries to the registry, allowing COM clients to create .NET classes.
- [Regsvcs.exe (.NET Services Installation Tool)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/tools/regsvcs-exe-net-services-installation-tool.md): Use Regsvcs.exe, the .NET Services Installation tool. Load and register an assembly, configure services you've added programmatically to a class, and more.
- [Resgen.exe (Resource File Generator)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/tools/resgen-exe-resource-file-generator.md): Use Resgen.exe, the Resource File Generator. Convert text (.txt, .restext) and XML resource format (.resx) files to embeddable CLR runtime binaries (.resources).
- [SecAnnotate.exe (.NET Security Annotator Tool)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/tools/secannotate-exe-net-security-annotator-tool.md): Use SecAnnotate.exe, the .NET Security Annotator tool. Identify SecurityCritical and SecuritySafeCritical portions of one or more assemblies.
- [SignTool.exe (Sign Tool)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/tools/signtool-exe.md): Learn about SignTool.exe, the Sign Tool. This command-line tool digitally signs files, verifies signatures in files, and applies timestamps to files.
- [Sn.exe (Strong Name Tool)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/tools/sn-exe-strong-name-tool.md): Get started with Sn.exe, the Strong Name tool. Sign assemblies with strong names. Manage keys, and generate and verify signatures.
- [SOS.dll (SOS Debugging Extension)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/tools/sos-dll-sos-debugging-extension.md): Use SOS.dll, the SOS debugging extension. Debug managed programs in Visual Studio and in WinDbg.exe by getting information about the internal CLR environment.
- [SqlMetal.exe (Code Generation Tool)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/tools/sqlmetal-exe-code-generation-tool.md): Understand SqlMetal.exe, the code generation tool. Use the tool to generate code and mapping for the LINQ to SQL component of .NET.
- [Storeadm.exe (Isolated Storage Tool)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/tools/storeadm-exe-isolated-storage-tool.md): Read about Storeadm.exe, the Isolated Storage tool. This tool lists or removes all existing stores for the current user.
- [Tlbexp.exe (Type Library Exporter)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/tools/tlbexp-exe-type-library-exporter.md): Review Tlbexp.exe, the Type Library Exporter. This tool generates a type library that describes the types defined in a common language runtime (CLR) assembly.
- [Tlbimp.exe (Type Library Importer)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md): Use Tlbimp.exe, the Type Library Importer. This tool converts type definitions found within a COM type library into equivalent definitions in a CLR assembly.
- [Winmdexp.exe Error Messages](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/tools/winmdexp-exe-error-messages.md): Understand Winmdexp.exe (Windows runtime metadata export tool) error messages, which only appear during the build process if .NET compilation succeeds.
- [Winmdexp.exe (Windows Runtime Metadata Export Tool)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/tools/winmdexp-exe-windows-runtime-metadata-export-tool.md): Understand Winmdexp.exe, the Windows Runtime Metadata Export Tool. This tool transforms a .NET module into a file that contains Windows Runtime metadata.
- [Winres.exe (Windows Resource Localization Editor)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/tools/winres-exe-windows-forms-resource-editor.md): Use Winres.exe, the Windows Resource Localization Editor. This visual layout tool helps localization experts localize Windows Forms UI resources used by forms.
